lead_paragraph: D'AGATI-PITASSY--Camille, 63, died peacefully in hospice after a short illness. Beloved wife of William Pitassy. In addition to her husband Camille is survived by her father Vincent D'Agati, brother Sebastian and her loving cousins Augusta Capizzi, James Alaimo, Joseph Liotta and Philip Liotta. Camille will forever be remembered for her love and kindness for her family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  D'AGATI, PITASSY, CAMILLE
